code: const BuddyListReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"RESET_BUDDY_LIST":state=[];return state;case"SET_BUDDY_LIST":const buddyList=action.payload;state=[...buddyList];return state;default:return state;}};export default BuddyListReducer;
